content:
CONTRACT AGREEMENT

This Contract ("Agreement") is made and entered into on the date of acceptance by the Client, by and between Beanstalk Consulting LLC dba "Beanstalk Consulting" (hereinafter referred to as "Consultant") and the Client (hereinafter referred to as "Client").

1. Term: This Agreement shall have a term of 3 months (hereinafter referred to as "Term").
2. Services: Consultant shall provide the following services to Client: virtual SDR program, purchase of up to 2 domains for cold email outreach, up to 800 prospects a month via Apollo, Inbox management for call scheduling, campaign & offer creation, Campaign testing and analytics.
3. Payment: Client shall pay Consultant a monthly rate of $2250 for the Term.
4. Additional Setup Time: If additional setup time is required beyond the first month, the parties shall mutually agree to extend the first month.
5. Optional Add-Ons: The following services are available as optional add-ons for an additional fee: Virtual Cold Caller, Handwritten Direct Mail Campaigns ($6.50/send), Sales Strategy Consulting ($200/hour for Dean), Additional Lead Sourcing
6. Testimonials: Client agrees to provide written testimonial within 90 days of the start of the Term, in order to receive the reduced price. Client also agrees to provide a video testimonial within the month following the date it is provided.
7. Performance Fees: A performance fee of 20% of Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR) generated by customers sourced by Beanstalk for the duration of their tenure as a client of Caller Intercept.
8. Compliance with Laws: Each party shall comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and ordinances.
9. Independent Contractors: The parties are independent contractors and nothing contained in this Agreement shall be deemed to create a partnership, joint venture, or agency relationship between the parties.
10. Non-Solicitation: During the Term and for a period of 12 months after the termination of this Agreement, neither party shall solicit the other party's employees or independent contractors for employment or engagement.
11. Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of [state], without giving effect to any choice of law or conflict of law provisions.
12. Entire Agreement: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof, and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous agreements and understandings, whether oral or written.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first above written.

Consultant: Beanstalk Consulting LLC dba "Beanstalk Consulting"

Client:
